pluggable.name: persistence
pluggable.author: Scott Merrill
pluggable.description: Alows you to authenticate to your Habari installation via a cookie stored on your PC

help.value: By default, Habari will log you out after a period of inactivity. If you're using a computer in a trusted place, this plugin lets you extend that period indefinitely so that you don't get logged out in the middle of writing that lengthy article about your favorite pony.
